attributes.action: we want to make gordon burns a sir, as he is a legend
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I gordon burns should be made a sir, for my great service to regional news broadcasting over the past 10 years

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
